Desc.eng: Another soul doomed to roam this shadow world for eternity? Speak your name and purpose!
Choose carefully, some of my names bear a terrible burden.
My name is Van Helsing and I'm here to destroy the he Faceless Tsar.
I fought him through numerous incarnations, only to get struck down and banished here every time.
And how did you escape from this world to born again?
I was released by a champion like you, who spoke my name. Oh, I had many.
Tell me yours then and let's get on with this.
My curse is not to remember. But you can find them at places where I was laid to rest. Will you release me?
Alright, I will release you by finding and speaking your name.
I'm not your champion. I have other responsibilities.
